title.text: Service Pack 1 for Forefront Identity Manager 2010 R2 - Add-ins and Extensions (KB2814853)

description.text: This is an important Service Pack for Forefront Identity Manager 2010 R2. This update enables support for Windows 8 and Office 2013.  This update also fixes a signing issue described in Microsoft Security Advisory 2749655, which affected hotfix rollup package KB2734159 (build 4.1.2515.0).
